name: Diligent Commerce
description: Ecommerce website experiences that inspire your customers to feel more and buy more. Our close team of strategically-minded individuals value style and substance, and what we offer goes beyond the launch of a website. We have partnered with some of the best-known companies to help them shape a successful ecommerce business on Magento, ensuring that customers are not only interacting with our website experiences but are inspired by them.
